attributes.action: Celebrate a National Street Party Day for all UK residents from all communities and religions.
attributes.additional_details: I would like to petition for a National Street Party day for all UK residents from all communities and all religions within the UK.I think that we need one day as a nation were all residents can be given the opportunity to blend their cultures and religion in a peaceful and calm enjoyable manner in order for us to understand one and other and grow as a mixed and blended nation. I would also like to create a planning committee for the celebrations to be managed in an appropriate way.
